Name: Phish Hook
Ingredients: 60 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
7.5 ml Punt E Mes vermouth amaro
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Rye whiskey tamed and flavoured by elderflower, Punt E Mes and maraschino.
History: Adapted from a January 2010 recipe courtesy of Jamie Boudreau's spiritsandcocktails.wordpress.com
Nutrition: One serving of Phish Hook contains 193 calories
